Events that occurred on 12 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1927 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Ronald Ashton.
1941 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 43a.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97c.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives Index questions from Nancy Smith.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to John Bush.
2003 - "Battle of Helm's Deep", the fifth set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, is released.
2012 - Update 6: Shores of the Great River, the sixth free update of The Lord of the Rings Online, is released.
2015 - Terry Pratchett dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Borondir and his companion are on their way in search of the Éothéod.
T.A. 3019:
Gollum leads Frodo and Sam into Shelob's Lair.
Faramir has to retreat to the Causeway Forts.
The Rohirrim travel towards Minas Tirith. They camp under Min-Rimmon.
Aragorn drives the enemy towards Pelargir.
The Ents overcome the invaders of Rohan.
